name: Sophie
content: Don't know where this is going
你知不知道这一切将去向何处
But I know this feeling well
You take my wallet and my keys
你拿走了我的钱包和钥匙
Don't come back until the morning
Sophie baby are you going crazy
Why d'you have to go so far
索菲，如果你试着毁掉我
You don't have to work so hard
Smoke is coming from the kitchen
And it doesn't smell like food
And all my clothes are missing
我所有的衣服都不见了
But there's no sign of you
And when I dial your number
I end up talking to that dude
没跟那个花花公子讲话
Sophie baby are you going crazy
Why d'you have to go so far
索菲，如果你试着毁掉我
You don't have to work so hard
Loving you is all I wanna
All I  all I really wanna do
我只想，我真的只想爱你
So come on Sophie all I wanna
All I  all I really want is you
Sophie baby are you going crazy
Why d'you have to go so far
索菲，如果你试着毁掉我
You don't have to work so hard
